sqlMap.sql: MBLOG_ID, MBLOG_TYPE, PARENT_MBLOG_ID, THREAD_ID, MBGROUP_ID, RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, CONTENTS, IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, REGIST_DATE, CONTENTS_DISPLAY, ISFAVORITE, PICTURE_PATH, PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH
USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_ENGLISH_NAME, TEAM_NAME, TEAM_ENGLISH_NAME, PICTURE_ID, PROFILE_PICTURE_ID, EXPERT_FIELD, ISFOLLOWING, PICTURE_PATH, PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IKEP4_MB_MBLOG ( /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.insert */ MBLOG_ID, MBLOG_TYPE, PARENT_MBLOG_ID, THREAD_ID, MBGROUP_ID, RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, CONTENTS, IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, REGIST_DATE, CONTENTS_DISPLAY ) VALUES (#mblogId#, #mblogType#, #parentMblogId#, #threadId#, #mbgroupId#, #retweetMblogId#, #contents#, #isRetweetAllowed#, #registerId#, #registerName#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #contentsDisplay#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.select */ mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , '' AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE mblog.MBLOG_ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.delete */ WHERE MBLOG_ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectTimelineList */
TOP $fetchSize$ /* fetchSize */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT B.MBLOG_ID, B.MBLOG_TYPE, B.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, B.THREAD_ID, B.MBGROUP_ID, B.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, B.CONTENTS, B.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, B.REGISTER_ID, B.REGIST_DATE, B.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID =B.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT mblog.* FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog
( SELECT #ownerId# as USER_ID UNION SELECT FOLLOWING_USER_ID as USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW WHERE USER_ID = #ownerId# ) userlist
WHERE
mblog.REGISTER_ID = userlist.USER_ID
mblog.REGISTER_ID = #ownerId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0)
UNION
SELECT mblog.* FROM IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag ON mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID = mbtag.MBTAG_ID AND mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID = mbtag.PORTAL_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = '0' AND mbtag.MBTAG_NAME = #ownerId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) /* ===========================================END */ ) B INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON B.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID ) A ) TBL ORDER BY MBLOG_ID DESC

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectThreadList */
FROM ( SELECT mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM ( SELECT A.THREAD_ID FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.THREAD_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.THREAD_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog
( SELECT #ownerId# as USER_ID UNION SELECT FOLLOWING_USER_ID as USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW WHERE USER_ID = #ownerId# ) userlist
WHERE mblog.MBLOG_TYPE = '0'
AND mblog.REGISTER_ID = userlist.USER_ID
AND mblog.REGISTER_ID = #ownerId#
AND mblog.THREAD_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.THREAD_ID > #standardMblogId#
AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) /* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) B INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog ON B.THREAD_ID = mblog.THREAD_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) )TBL ORDER BY THREAD_ID DESC, MBLOG_TYPE ASC, MBLOG_ID ASC

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectGroupTimelineList */
FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY A.MBLOG_ID DESC) RNUM, A.MBLOG_ID, A.MBLOG_TYPE, A.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, A.THREAD_ID, A.MBGROUP_ID, A.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, A.CONTENTS, A.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, A.REGISTER_ID, A.REGIST_DATE, A.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = A.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT mblog.* FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag ON mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID = mbtag.MBTAG_ID AND mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID = mbtag.PORTAL_ID WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = '0' AND mbtag.MBTAG_NAME = #mbgroupId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
UNION
SELECT mblog.* FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog WHERE mblog.MBGROUP_ID = #mbgroupId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON A.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID ) TBL
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectGroupThreadList */
FROM ( SELECT mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY B.THREAD_ID DESC) AS RNUM, B.THREAD_ID FROM ( SELECT A.THREAD_ID FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT mblog.THREAD_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag ON mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID = mbtag.MBTAG_ID AND mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID = mbtag.PORTAL_ID WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = '0' AND mbtag.MBTAG_NAME = #mbgroupId# AND mblog.MBLOG_TYPE = '0'
AND mblog.THREAD_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.THREAD_ID > #standardMblogId#
UNION
SELECT mblog.THREAD_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog WHERE mblog.MBGROUP_ID = #mbgroupId# AND mblog.MBLOG_TYPE = '0'
AND mblog.THREAD_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.THREAD_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A ) B
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) C INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog ON C.THREAD_ID = mblog.THREAD_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID ) TBL ORDER BY THREAD_ID DESC, MBLOG_TYPE ASC, MBLOG_ID ASC

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectTimelineAllList */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0)
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectThreadAllList */
FROM ( SELECT mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM ( SELECT A.THREAD_ID FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.THREAD_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.THREAD_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog WHERE mblog.MBLOG_TYPE = '0' AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0)
AND mblog.THREAD_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.THREAD_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) B INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog ON B.THREAD_ID = mblog.THREAD_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) ) TBL ORDER BY THREAD_ID DESC, MBLOG_TYPE ASC

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectAddonListByAddonType */ , ADDON_CODE, DISPLAY_CODE, SOURCE_LINK, FILE_REAL_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC, mbaddon.ADDON_CODE DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE, mbaddon.ADDON_CODE, mbaddon.DISPLAY_CODE, mbaddon.SOURCE_LINK, (select dmfile.FILE_REAL_NAME from IKEP4_DM_FILE dmfile where mbaddon.SOURCE_LINK = dmfile.FILE_ID) FILE_REAL_NAME FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2ADDON mblog2addon ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2addon.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_ADDON mbaddon ON mblog2addon.ADDON_CODE = mbaddon.ADDON_CODE INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE mblog.REGISTER_ID = #ownerId# AND mbaddon.ADDON_TYPE = #addonType#
AND ( ( mblog.MBLOG_ID = #standardMblogId# AND mbaddon.ADDON_CODE < #standardAddonCode# ) OR mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId# )
AND ( ( mblog.MBLOG_ID = #standardMblogId# AND mbaddon.ADDON_CODE > #standardAddonCode# ) OR mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId# )
AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) /* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectRetwitByMeList */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE mblog.REGISTER_ID = #ownerId# AND len(mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID) > 0
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) /* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectRetwitByOtherList */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT DISTINCT mblog.MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog2 ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID WHERE mblog.REGISTER_ID = #ownerId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) /* ===========================================END */ ) A INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog ON A.MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectRetwitFromOutsideList */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog2 ON mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID = mblog2.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE mblog.MBGROUP_ID = #mbgroupId# AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID <> mblog2.MBGROUP_ID OR mblog2.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL)
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectRetwitToOutsideList */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog2 ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE mblog.MBGROUP_ID = #mbgroupId# AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID <> mblog2.MBGROUP_ID OR mblog2.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL)
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectMyMentionList */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag ON mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID = mbtag.MBTAG_ID AND mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID = mbtag.PORTAL_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = '0' AND (mbtag.MBTAG_NAME = #ownerId# OR mbtag.MBTAG_NAME = #ownerGroupId# ) AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0)
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectFavoriteList */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE mbfavorite ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mbfavorite.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE mbfavorite.USER_ID = #ownerId# AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0)
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL
SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectCount */ COUNT(MBLOG_ID) FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG WHERE MBLOG_ID = #id#

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectTweetListByTag */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag ON mbtag.MBTAG_ID = mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog ON mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = #mbtagType# AND lower(mbtag.MBTAG_NAME) like '%' + lower(#searchWord#) + '%' AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = #portalId# AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0)
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectUserListByHashTag */
FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY A.REGISTER_ID DESC) AS RNUM, evUser.*, (SELECT follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW follow WHERE follow.USER_ID = #loginId# AND evUser.USER_ID = follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID ) AS ISFOLLOWING FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT distinct( mblog.REGISTER_ID ) FROM IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag, IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag, IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = '1' AND lower(mbtag.MBTAG_NAME) like '%' + lower(#searchWord#) + '%' AND mbtag.MBTAG_ID = mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = #portalId# AND mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) /* ===========================================END */ ) A INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON A.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.REGISTER_ID < #standardUserId#
AND A.REGISTER_ID > #standardUserId#
) TBL
AND RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectUserListByMentionTag */
FROM ( SELECT A.*, (SELECT follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW follow WHERE follow.USER_ID = #loginId# AND A.USER_ID = follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID ) AS ISFOLLOWING FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY evUser.USER_ID DESC) AS RNUM, * FROM IKEP4_EV_USER evUser WHERE lower(evUser.USER_ID) like '%' + lower(#searchWord#) + '%' AND evUser.PORTAL_ID = #portalId#
AND evUser.USER_ID < #standardUserId#
AND evUser.USER_ID > #standardUserId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectTweetListByGroupTag */
FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY A.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, A.MBLOG_ID, A.MBLOG_TYPE, A.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, A.THREAD_ID, A.MBGROUP_ID, A.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, A.CONTENTS, A.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, A.REGISTER_ID, A.REGIST_DATE, A.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = A.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT mblog.* FROM IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag, IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag, IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = #mbtagType# AND lower(mbtag.MBTAG_NAME) like '%' + lower(#searchWord#) + '%' AND mbtag.MBTAG_ID = mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = #portalId# AND mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID AND mblog.MBGROUP_ID = #mbgroupId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
UNION
SELECT mblog.* FROM IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag, IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag, IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog, IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag2, IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag2 WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = #mbtagType# AND lower(mbtag.MBTAG_NAME) like '%' + lower(#searchWord#) + '%' AND mbtag.MBTAG_ID = mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = #portalId# AND mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID
AND mbtag2.MBTAG_TYPE = '0' AND mbtag2.MBTAG_NAME = #mbgroupId# AND mbtag2.MBTAG_ID = mblog2tag2.MBTAG_ID AND mblog2tag2.MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON A.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID ) TBL
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectUserListByGroupHashTag */
FROM ( SELECT evUser.*, (SELECT follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW follow WHERE follow.USER_ID = #loginId# AND evUser.USER_ID = follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID ) AS ISFOLLOWING FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY A.REGISTER_ID DESC) AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT distinct( mblog.REGISTER_ID ) AS REGISTER_ID, '' AS ISFOLLOWING FROM IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag ON mbtag.MBTAG_ID = mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog ON mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = '1' AND lower(mbtag.MBTAG_NAME) like '%' + lower(#searchWord#) + '%' AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = #portalId# AND mblog.MBGROUP_ID = #mbgroupId#
UNION
SELECT distinct( mblog.REGISTER_ID ) AS REGISTER_ID, '' AS ISFOLLOWING FROM IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag ON mbtag.MBTAG_ID = mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog ON mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag2 ON mblog2tag2.MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag2 ON mbtag2.MBTAG_ID = mblog2tag2.MBTAG_ID WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = '1' AND lower(mbtag.MBTAG_NAME) like '%' + lower(#searchWord#) + '%' AND mbtag.PORTAL_ID = #portalId# AND mbtag2.MBTAG_TYPE = '0' AND mbtag2.MBTAG_NAME = #mbgroupId# /* ===========================================END */ ) A ) B, IKEP4_EV_USER evUser WHERE B.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID
AND B.REGISTER_ID < #standardUserId#
AND B.REGISTER_ID > #standardUserId#
AND B.RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectUserListByGroupMentionTag */
FROM ( SELECT A.*, (SELECT follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW follow WHERE follow.USER_ID = #loginId# AND A.USER_ID = follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID ) AS ISFOLLOWING FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY evUser.USER_ID DESC) AS RNUM, evUser.* FROM IKEP4_EV_USER evUser INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBGROUP_MEMBER mbgroupMember ON evUser.USER_ID = mbgroupMember.MEMBER_ID WHERE lower(evUser.USER_ID) like '%' + lower(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND mbgroupmember.MBGROUP_ID = #mbgroupId# AND mbgroupmember.STATUS = '1' AND evUser.PORTAL_ID = #portalId#
AND evUser.USER_ID < #standardUserId#
AND evUser.USER_ID > #standardUserId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectParentNReplyListByMblogId */
FROM ( SELECT mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ( mblog.MBLOG_ID = #mblogId# OR mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID = #mblogId# OR mblog.MBLOG_ID = ( SELECT PARENT_MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG WHERE MBLOG_ID = #mblogId# ) ) )A ORDER BY A.MBLOG_ID ASC

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectRetweetUserListByMblogId */
FROM ( SELECT evUser.*, (SELECT follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW follow WHERE follow.USER_ID = #loginId# AND evUser.USER_ID = follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID ) AS ISFOLLOWING FROM ( SELECT distinct (mblog.REGISTER_ID) FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog WHERE mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID = #mblogId# )A INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON A.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID ) TBL

WITH TMP AS ( SELECT mblog.REGIST_DATE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog WHERE mblog.MBLOG_ID = #id# ), CTE AS ( SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, (SELECT * FROM TMP), 112) REGIST_DATE, 0 DAYS UNION ALL SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, DATEADD(DD, DAYS + 1, (SELECT * FROM TMP)), 112) REGIST_DATE, DAYS + 1 FROM CTE WHERE DAYS < 10 ) SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectRetweetStatisticsByMblogId */
FROM ( SELECT A.DAYS, COUNT(*) CNT FROM CTE A, ( SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, mblog.REGIST_DATE, 112) REGIST_DATE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog WHERE mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID = #id# ) B WHERE A.REGIST_DATE >= B.REGIST_DATE AND A.REGIST_DATE <= CONVERT(NVARCHAR, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 112) GROUP BY A.DAYS ) TBL ORDER BY TBL.DAYS

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectMentionedUserListByMblogId */
FROM ( SELECT evUser.*, (SELECT follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW follow WHERE follow.USER_ID = #loginId# AND evUser.USER_ID = follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID ) AS ISFOLLOWING FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT distinct(mbtag.MBTAG_NAME) USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag ON mbtag.PORTAL_ID = mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID AND mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID = mbtag.MBTAG_ID WHERE mblog.MBLOG_ID = #mblogId# AND mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = '0' /* ===========================================END */ ) A INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON A.USER_ID = evUser.USER_ID ) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectUserInfoByUserId */
FROM ( SELECT evUser.*, (SELECT follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW follow WHERE follow.USER_ID = #loginId# AND evUser.USER_ID = follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID ) AS ISFOLLOWING FROM IKEP4_EV_USER evUser WHERE evUser.USER_ID = #memberId# ) TBL
SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectMyTweetCount */ COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG WHERE REGISTER_ID = #id# AND (MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(MBGROUP_ID) = 0)

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectTimelineListUserOnly */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY B.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, B.MBLOG_ID, B.MBLOG_TYPE, B.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, B.THREAD_ID, B.MBGROUP_ID, B.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, B.CONTENTS, B.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, B.REGISTER_ID, B.REGIST_DATE, B.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID =B.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT mblog.* FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog WHERE mblog.REGISTER_ID = #ownerId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) /* ===========================================END */ ) B INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON B.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID ) A WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */ ) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectFollowingList */
FROM ( SELECT evUser.*, evUser.USER_ID AS ISFOLLOWING FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY followA.FOLLOWING_USER_ID DESC) AS RNUM, followA.FOLLOWING_USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW followA
,IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW followB
WHERE followA.USER_ID = #ownerId#
AND followB.USER_ID = #loginId# AND followA.FOLLOWING_USER_ID = followB.FOLLOWING_USER_ID
AND followA.FOLLOWING_USER_ID < #standardUserId#
AND followA.FOLLOWING_USER_ID > #standardUserId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON A.FOLLOWING_USER_ID = evUser.USER_ID
AND RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectFollowerList */
FROM ( SELECT evUser.*, (SELECT follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW follow WHERE follow.USER_ID = #loginId# AND evUser.USER_ID = follow.FOLLOWING_USER_ID ) AS ISFOLLOWING FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY followA.USER_ID DESC) AS RNUM, /*+ index ( followA IDX_MB_FOLLOW_IE1) */ followA.USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW followA
,IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW followB
WHERE followA.FOLLOWING_USER_ID = #ownerId#
AND followB.FOLLOWING_USER_ID = #loginId# AND followA.USER_ID = followB.USER_ID
AND followA.USER_ID < #standardUserId#
AND followA.USER_ID > #standardUserId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON A.USER_ID = evUser.USER_ID
AND RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL
SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectGroupTweetCount */ COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG WHERE MBGROUP_ID = #id#

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectUserIdForAutoComplete */ USER_ID FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY min(TYPE) ASC, max(REGIST_DATE) DESC) AS RNUM, USER_ID, min(TYPE) AS TYPE FROM ( SELECT mbtag.MBTAG_NAME as USER_ID, max(mblog.REGIST_DATE) REGIST_DATE, '1' as TYPE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag ON mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID = mbtag.MBTAG_ID AND mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID = mbtag.PORTAL_ID WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = '0' AND mblog.REGISTER_ID = #loginId# AND mbtag.MBTAG_NAME like #memberId#+'%' AND mblog.REGIST_DATE >= (DATEADD(MM, -1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) GROUP BY mbtag.MBTAG_NAME
UNION
SELECT FOLLOWING_USER_ID as USER_ID, REGIST_DATE, '2' as TYPE FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND FOLLOWING_USER_ID like #memberId#+'%'
) A GROUP BY USER_ID ) B WHERE RNUM <= 10 ORDER BY USER_ID

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectRecentFileListByAddonType */ DISPLAY_CODE, FILE_REAL_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY max(mblog.REGIST_DATE) DESC) AS RNUM, mbaddon.DISPLAY_CODE, (select dmfile.FILE_REAL_NAME from IKEP4_DM_FILE dmfile where mbaddon.SOURCE_LINK = dmfile.FILE_ID) FILE_REAL_NAME FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog, IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2ADDON mblog2addon, IKEP4_MB_ADDON mbaddon WHERE mblog.REGISTER_ID = #loginId# AND mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2addon.MBLOG_ID AND mblog2addon.ADDON_CODE = mbaddon.ADDON_CODE AND mbaddon.ADDON_TYPE = #addonType# GROUP BY mbaddon.DISPLAY_CODE, mbaddon.SOURCE_LINK /* ===========================================END */ ) A WHERE RNUM <= 10 /* fetchSize */ ) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectWorkspaceTimelineList */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog, IKEP4_EV_USER evUser , ( SELECT MEMBER_ID as USER_ID FROM IKEP4_WS_MEMBER WHERE WORKSPACE_ID = #workspaceId# AND MEMBER_LEVEL IN ('1','2','3','4') ) userlist WHERE mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID AND mblog.REGISTER_ID = userlist.USER_ID
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) /* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectMyMentionList */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBTAG mbtag INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG2TAG mblog2tag ON mblog2tag.MBTAG_ID = mbtag.MBTAG_ID AND mblog2tag.PORTAL_ID = mbtag.PORTAL_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog ON mblog.MBLOG_ID = mblog2tag.MBLOG_ID INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_USER evUser ON mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID WHERE mbtag.MBTAG_TYPE = '0' AND mbtag.MBTAG_NAME = #ownerGroupId# AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0)
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
/* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL

SELECT /* [Mblog_SqlMap.xml] mblog.selectWorkspaceTimelineList */
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY mblog.MBLOG_ID DESC) AS RNUM, mblog.MBLOG_ID, mblog.MBLOG_TYPE, mblog.PARENT_MBLOG_ID, mblog.THREAD_ID, mblog.MBGROUP_ID, mblog.RETWEET_MBLOG_ID, mblog.CONTENTS, mblog.IS_RETWEET_ALLOWED, mblog.REGISTER_ID, mblog.REGIST_DATE, mblog.CONTENTS_DISPLAY, evUser.USER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME, evUser.USER_ENGLISH_NAME AS REGISTER_ENGLISH_NAME, evUser.PICTURE_PATH, evUser.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH , (SELECT MBLOG_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FAVORITE WHERE USER_ID = #loginId# AND MBLOG_ID = mblog.MBLOG_ID ) AS ISFAVORITE FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog, IKEP4_EV_USER evUser , ( SELECT FOLLOWING_USER_ID as USER_ID FROM IKEP4_MB_FOLLOW WHERE USER_ID = #ownerId# ) userlist WHERE mblog.REGISTER_ID = evUser.USER_ID AND mblog.REGISTER_ID = userlist.USER_ID
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID < #standardMblogId#
AND mblog.MBLOG_ID > #standardMblogId#
AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR len(mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0) /* ===========================================END */ ) A
WHERE RNUM <= #fetchSize# /* fetchSize */
) TBL
